selector: :is(li, p, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, dd, blockquote, .kiss-p)

.markdown-body :is(li, p, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, dd, blockquote, .kiss-p), .repo-description p, .Layout-sidebar .f4, .container-lg .py-4 .f5, .container-lg .my-4 .f5, .Box-row .pr-4, .Box-row article .mt-1, [itemprop="description"], .markdown-title, bdi, .ws-pre-wrap, .status-meta, span.status-meta, .col-10.color-fg-muted, .TimelineItem-body, .pinned-item-list-item-content .color-fg-muted, .markdown-body td, .markdown-body th, [data-testid="issue-pr-title-link"], h4.mb-2, h4.mb-2+span
